title: Trend Micro Deep Security Anti-Malware Solution Platform Link Following Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Trend Micro Deep Security Agent. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the Anti-Malware Solution Platform. By creating a junction, an attacker can abuse the service to delete a folder. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Trend Micro has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://success.trendmicro.com/en-US/solution/KA-0019344
timeline:
2024-09-05 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-04-09 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-04-09 - Advisory Updated
